title: Murky potion

properties.name: description
properties.value: A murky potion is a potion made during the 2017 Halloween event. It can be made by giving the Apothecary in Varrock tin ore, grain, and tomberries. It is then used on the Zamorakian altar in the southern part of Varrock to create a spectral potion.

content:
Murky potion was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Murky potion
Released19 October 2017 (Update)

Item ID21711

A murky potion is a potion made during the 2017 Halloween event. It can be made by giving the Apothecary in Varrock tin ore, grain, and tomberries. It is then used on the Zamorakian altar in the southern part of Varrock to create a spectral potion.

[[File:Murky potion detail.png|left|120px]]
A '''murky potion''' is a potion made during the [[2017 Halloween event]]. It can be made by giving the [[Apothecary]] in [[Varrock]] [[tin ore]], [[grain]], and [[tomberries]]. It is then used on the Zamorakian altar in the southern part of Varrock to create a [[spectral potion]].
